details.arabic_diacless: أعوذ بكلمات اللٰه التامات من شر ما خلق
details.arabic: أَعُوْذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ اللّٰهِ التَّامَّاتِ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
details.translations: I take refuge in Allaah's perfect words from the evil He has created.
details.bottom: …three times in the evening will be protected from insect stings.
details.reference: Ahmad 2/ 290, An-Nasa'i, At-Tirmizi 3/187, Ibn As-Sunni (Hadith no. 68), Ibn Majah 2/266.
